analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/27/0x264c9629de0278c27d708e7ac27e40173b51197f.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.2 (/unique_chucks/27/0x264c9629de0278c27d708e7ac27e40173b51197f.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_tokens' of StandardToken.CheckBest (/unique_chucks/27/0x264c9629de0278c27d708e7ac27e40173b51197f.sol#204-205) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_address' of StandardToken.CheckBest (/unique_chucks/27/0x264c9629de0278c27d708e7ac27e40173b51197f.sol#205) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_num' of LeviusDAO.GetBestTokenCount (/unique_chucks/27/0x264c9629de0278c27d708e7ac27e40173b51197f.sol) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_num' of LeviusDAO.GetBestWalletAddress (/unique_chucks/27/0x264c9629de0278c27d708e7ac27e40173b51197f.sol) is not in mixedCase
